data.text: Levi ne hai ana dama daane dogodolu: go Gershon, Kohath mo Merari.
Kohath ne hai ana dama daane dogohaa: Amram, Izhar, Hebron mo Uzziel.
Amram guu hai ana dama daane dogolua: go Aaron mo Moses, ge dahi dama ahina go Miriam.
Nia hagadili o Eleazar mai di adu dangada gaa tugi di adu dangada le e hagatau beenei: Phinehas, Abishua,
Bukki, Uzzi,
Zerahiah, Meraioth,
Amariah, Ahitub,
Zadok, Ahimaaz,
Azariah, Johanan,
Azariah (tangada dela nogo hai ana hegau i lodo di Hale Daumaha dela ne hau go King Solomon i Jerusalem),
Amariah, Ahitub,
Zadok, Shallum,
Hilkiah, Azariah,
Seraiah, Jehozadak.
Jehozadak la ne hagabagi go King Nebuchadnezzar dalia nia hoo nia daangada o Judah mo Jerusalem ala ne hagabagi go Dimaadua gi daha mo di nadau henua.
Levi ne hai ana dama daane dogodolu go Gershon, Kohath mo Merari.
Digaula huogodoo guu hai nadau dama daane. Gershon la go tamana o Libni mo Shimei.
Kohath la go tamana o Amram, Izhar, Hebron mo Uzziel.
Gei Merari la go tamana o Mahli mo Mushi.6.19 Exodus 6.16-19
Aanei nia hagadili o Gershon mai i di adu daangada gaa tugi i di adu daangada: go Libni, Jahath, Zimmah,
Joah, Iddo, Zerah, Jeatherai.
Aanei nia hagadili o Kohath mai i di adu daangada gaa tugi i di adu daangada: go Amminadab, Korah, Assir,
Elkanah, Ebiasaph, Assir,
Tahath, Uriel, Uzziah, Shaul.
Elkanah guu hai ana dama daane dogolua: go Amasai mo Ahimoth.
Aanei nia hagadili o Ahimoth mai di adu daangada gaa tugi i di adu daangada: go Elkanah, Zophai, Nahath,
Eliab, Jeroham, Elkanah.
Samuel guu hai ana dama daane dogolua: go Joel, tama madua, mo Abijah, tama dulii.
Aanei nia hagadili o Merari mai i di adu daangada gaa tugi i di adu daangada: go Mahli, Libni, Shimei, Uzzah,
Shimea, Haggiah, Asaiah.
Aanei nia daane a di king go David ne wanga ginai tegau dela e madamada humalia nia daahili i di gowaa hai daumaha i lodo Jerusalem, i muli Tebedebe o di Hagababa ma gaa kae gi lodo.
Digaula e hagadau i di nadau moomee i lodo di Hale laa dela e noho ai Dimaadua no lodo i di madagoaa i mua di King Solomon ne hau di Hale Daumaha.
Aanei di hagatau gi muli o nia madahaanau o digau ala e kae di waawa o nia hegau aanei:
Elkanah, Jeroham, Eliel, Toah,
Zuph, Elkanah, Mahath, Amasai,
Elkanah, Joel, Azariah, Zephaniah,
Tahath, Assir, Ebiasaph, Korah,
Izhar, Kohath, Levi, Jacob.
Asaph di tagi togo lua buini daahili. Di hagatau gi muli o dono madahaanau gaa tugi i Levi le e hai beenei: Asaph, Berechiah, Shimea,
Michael, Baaseiah, Malchijah,
Ethni, Zerah, Adaiah,
Ethan, Zimmah, Shimei,
Jahath, Gershon, Levi.
Ethan, tangada mai i di madahaanau damana o Merari, di tagi o togo dolu buini daahili. Di hagatau gi muli o dono madahaanau gaa tugi i Levi le e hai beenei: Ethan, Kishi, Abdi, Malluch,
Hashabiah, Amaziah, Hilkiah,
Amzi, Bani, Shemer,
Mahli, Mushi, Merari, Levi.
Nia hoo o digau Levi la guu wanga ginai nia moomee huogodoo ala i golo i lodo di gowaa hai daumaha.

Aaron mo ono hagadili guu hai di nadau tigidaumaha gi nia ‘incense’, gei gu dahi aga nadau mee hagalabagau ala e wanga gi hongo di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha. Digaula ala e madamada humalia nia hegau dabu huogodoo o nia daumaha i lodo di Gowaa Dabuaahia Huoloo mo nia tigidaumaha huogodoo ala God e dumaalia ang gi nia hala o digau Israel. Digaula e hai nia mee aanei huogodoo gii hai be nia boloagi ala ne hai go Moses, tama hai hegau a God.
Deenei di hagatau gi muli nia hagadili o Aaron: Eleazar, Phineas, Abishua,
Bukki, Uzzi, Zerahiah,
Meraioth, Amariah, Ahidub,
Zadok, Ahimaaz.
Deenei tenua ne haga ingoo gi nia hagadili o Aaron mai di madahaanau damana o Kohath. Digaula ne kae di baahi gowaa dela ne haga ingoo gi digau Levi matagidagi.
Di gowaa deenei e hagapuni gi Hebron i lodo tenua go Judah mo nia henua ala e daabui mai ono daha.
Nia gowaa maalama mo nia dama guongo lligi ala e dau gi di waahale damana la gu haga ingoo gi Caleb, tama daane a Jephunneh.

Nia waahale aanei i lala gu haga ingoo gi nia hagadili o Aaron: Hebron, di waahale e pala ginai, Jattir mo nia waahale o Libnah, Eshtemoa, Hilen, Debir, Ashan mo Beth Shemesh, ngaadahi mo nia henua dugu manu ala i golo.

I lodo tenua o Benjamin, digaula gu haga ingoo ginai nia waahale aanei mo ono henua dugu manu: Geba, Alemeth, mo Anathoth. Deenei ga hagapuni huogodoo nia waahale e madangaholu maa dolu ang gi nadau madahaanau huogodoo gii noho i no lodo.
Nia waahale e madangaholu i lodo tenua Manasseh Bahi i dai guu wanga gi nia madahaanau o Kohath ala i golo gu nohonoho i mada haanau. Nia maa guu wanga ne hudihudi gi nia hadu.
Nia waahale e madangaholu maa dolu i lodo tenua damana o Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, mo Manasseh Bahi i dua i Bashan guu wanga gi di madahaanau damana o Gershon.
I di hai la hua, nia waahale e madangaholu maa lua i lodo tenua damana o Reuben, Gad mo Zebulun guu wanga gi di madahaanau damana o Merari, gu nohonoho i mada haanau.
Ma gaa hai beenei, digau Israel la ne wanga nadau waahale gi digau Levi gii noho i no lodo ngaadahi mo nia henua ala e haganiga mai i daha o nia waahale aalaa.
(Nia waahale ala i lodo tenua damana o Judah, Simeon, mo Benjamin ala gu haga modongoohia i nua, guu wanga labelaa gi digaula ne hai di hudihudi.)
Hunu gau i di madahaanau damana o Kohath, guu wanga ginai nadau waahale mono henua dugu manu i lodo tenua damana o Ephraim:
Shechem, di waahale e pala ginai dela i lodo nia gonduu o Ephraim, Gezer,
Jokmeam, Beth Horon,
Aijalon, mo Gath Rimmon.
I lodo tenua damana o Manasseh Bahi i Dai, digaula guu wanga ginai nia waahale a Aner mo Bileam ngaadahi mo nia henua dugu manu ala e haganiga mai i daha.
Nia gau o di madahaanau damana o Gershon guu wanga ginai nia waahale aanei ngaadahi mo nia henua dugu manu ala e haganiga mai i daha:
I lodo tenua damana a Issachar go Kedesh, Daberath,
Ramoth, mo Anem.
I lodo tenua damana o Asher go Mashal, Abdon,
Hukok mo Rehob.
I lodo tenua damana o Naphtali go Kedesh i lodo Galilee, Hammon mo Kiriathaim.
Nia madahaanau o di madahaanau damana o Merari ala e dubu i golo guu wanga ginai nia waahale aanei ngaadahi mo nia henua dugu manu ala e haganiga mai i daha:
I lodo tenua damana a Reuben, i bahi i dua di monowai Jordan i baahi gi golo Jericho, go Bezer i hongo di gowaa nnoonua baba, Jahzah,
Kedemoth, mo Mephaath.
I lodo tenua damana a Gad go Ramoth i Gilead, Mahanaim,
Heshbon mo Jazer.
